entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
